description: Exif specifications define files mainly intended for digital photography, including attached sound. TIFF_UNC_EXIF is one of two file types defined in the specification.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">TIF</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Exchangeable image file format for digital still cameras: Exif Version 2.2
